Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of CAD models compared to the final physical products or prototypes.
Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate CAD Models / Total CAD Models Reviewed) * 100

Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.EXPLANATION: Assesses the efficiency of CAD modeling processes.
Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.FORMULA: (Total Number of CAD Models Completed / Total Hours Spent on CAD Models)

Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to complete CAD models from initial concept to final model.
Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on Completing CAD Models / Number of CAD Models Completed

Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of CAD models that require rework before final approval.
Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.FORMULA: (Number of Reworked CAD Models / Total CAD Models) * 100

Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for CAD modeling adhere to the budgeted costs.
Evaluates the overall quality of CAD models based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of CAD Models

Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.EXPLANATION: Measures stakeholder satisfaction with the quality and effectiveness of CAD models.
Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.FORMULA: (Sum of Stakeholder Satisfaction Ratings for CAD Models / Number of Stakeholders)

Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of CAD models successfully transitioned to prototypes.
Product Development+Design+Computer-Aide.FORMULA: (Number of CAD Models Transitioned to Prototypes / Total CAD Models) * 100
